cross.datastructures.fragments
Class Fragment

java.lang.Object
  cross.datastructures.fragments.Fragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFragment, IXMLSerializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, java.util.Comparator<IFragment>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NamedGroupFragment
public class Fragment
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFragment

Abstract base class for Fragments. Defines and implements default behavior.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
